name: Patient First Maryland Medical Group PLLC

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Patient First Maryland Medical Group PLLC is a Family Medicine provider based in Glen Allen, VA. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $19.5M in Medicaid payments across 767K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $19.5M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
